page.title: 16INTERVIEWS
page.content: Comments about the area by locals. "Totnes is a healthy place to live." "It's nice to live near transport , especially trains." "We have seen great changes in the area such as a second bridge,prisoners and soldiers used as labourers during the war, Follaton houses built in 1930 and now Follaton Village in 1984-5." "The surrounding land is beautiful." "Many fields have been taken over for building." "The main street of Totnes is too narrow to shop easily." "The main Plymouth road to Totnes was lined with oak trees. There were only horses and carts, and even they couldn't pass. Now the trees have been chopped d own, the road widened and a pavement built." "All the elm trees have died from Dutch Elm Disease."
